title: WHY IS THERE SO MANY SMURF ACCOUNTS
body: I have recently started playing League and from the matches i've played so far, ALL of them have had smurf account players. I really want to learn how to play League but I can't learn anything while being matched up with people who have played this game for a while and immediately the game is over in 10 minutes.

replies.body: Don't let riot suck you in. It's a endless cycle of Over powering and nurfing champs they can't get it right or don't give a crap. It's a trash unbalanced game don't waste your time. Play Overwatch or Fornite.

Hang in there, the promise land around post level 10-12 when a lot of the smurfs get bored is near. That said, learn what you can of the game, maybe figure out what kind of Champion you really enjoy playing.
Play BOT games until you SMOKE the Intermediate AI games (I mean zero deaths)

Actually, you'll get better playing vs smurfs, you'll hit 30 way better then most players would of back in my day.

When I smurf though I usually give advice.

The problem is at levels 1-9 players don't usually know enough about the game to learn anything from being stomped by someone much better than them. They are still learning like what items to buy and what the jungle camps are for and really basic stuff like that so anything they could learn from playing against a level 30 player is lost on them. Unless perhaps they are playing on the same team as them and are able to observe without getting blown up instantly, but even then, they are still lacking basic game knowledge. 

Good for you for giving advice, but most smurfs stomp and move on.

While i cant stand smurfs, dont try to sell the equal skill story cuz its BS. I'm pretty new to league and i get matched against golds in ranked games, and some diamonds in my normals games so dont try to sell me the its equall. Riot was the dumbest matchmaking system and nothing is equal in matchmaking.

Some folks smurf to help a newbie learn the game , usually a friend . 

Some folk smurf because they are bad and like beating on new players so they can win once in a while . 

Some folk smurf because they want to experience leveling up to 30 again.

And then there a the folk who smurf because they got permabanned , and have no other recourse if they want to keep playing.

So many smurf's because so many player's have fragile ego's. When they can no longer compete with players of their experience they make new accounts to play with new players so they can feel good about them selves.

There are Smurfs because there simply is no other way to level a new account than to just play it out the same way as everyone else. Don't blame people for wanting to level a new acc. It isn't like most people are playing in pre30 normals because they want to.
I don't see a very good reason for having another account unless you're master +

I see I've been downvoted- might I ask why? Leveling a new account is something that everyone can do if they wish, and whether or not you believe there to be a reason one would need multiple accounts, they are entitled to do so provided they are the creator of that account and aren't using it for boosting purposes.

Why _are_  there so many smurf accounts? 

Not "why is there so many smurf accounts"

Try using your brain OP.
